metadata.Title: CVE-2021-31799 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In RDoc 3.11 through 6.x before 6.3.1, as distributed with Ruby through 3.0.1, it is possible to execute arbitrary code via | and tags in a filename.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2021-31799` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libruby2.7 - 2.7.4-1ubuntu1
ruby2.7 - 2.7.4-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ruby2.7 package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.7.4-1ubuntu1').
